transcript: What time is it? They're supposed to run on it on midnight. This is great isn't it? Look at this night we've got here. It couldn't be better.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: What time is it?  They're supposed to run around midnight.  This is great isn't it?  Look at this night we've got here.  It couldn't be better.
